entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, Laurentides (Réserve faunique)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:07 a.m. EDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: L'Étape 1:00 PM EDT Monday 1 May 2023

Humidity: 98 %

Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Monday: Rain at times heavy. High 7.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 10 to 20 mm except 40 mm over eastern sections. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 this evening. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 1 May 2023
